attributes.behaviorNotes: James shows genuine interest in understanding fundamental concepts. He takes detailed notes during lectures and participates actively in class discussions about complexity analysis.
attributes.teacherFeedback: Good start with array implementations. James grasps the basic concepts well but should focus more on time complexity analysis. Recommended additional practice problems for better understanding of space complexity.
attributes.parentComments: James has been spending extra time studying the complexity analysis concepts. He mentioned finding the visual representations of algorithms particularly helpful.
attributes.title: Week 1 Progress Report - Data Structures
attributes.description: Weekly progress report for Introduction to Data Structures module
